registerDependency

public static <T> void registerDependency(Class<T> dependencyIF,
                                          Class<? extends T> dependencyImpl)
Registers an implementation class for a given dependency.

Parameters:
dependencyIF - The interface for a dependency
dependencyImpl - The implementation class to be used to supply a dependency

registerImplementation

public static void registerImplementation(Class<?> dependencyIF,
                                          Object object)
Registers an implementation class for a given dependency. The given Class can be a SuperType or a SuperInterface of the given Object.

Parameters:
dependencyIF - The interface for a dependency
dependencyImpl - The implementation to be used to supply a dependency

public static void removeImplementation(Class<?> klass)

resolveDependency

protected static <T> Class<? extends T> resolveDependency(Class<T> dependencyIF)
Gets the dependency's implementation for a given dependency

Parameters:
dependencyIF - the dependency interface.
Returns:
the dependency's implementation, if exists, or null if doesn't exists.
